title: Bug 113047 - No children node listed when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, no children node is listed.
EB: The expected result is that when the data source is changed, the children of the new data source are listed.
SR:
1. Open the data set editor page in the query tab.
2. Change the data source for a data set.
3. Verify that the children of the new data source are listed as expected.
